<font size = "4">Hello! 👋 </font>

<div style="display:block; margin:15px;"></div>

I am an **assistant professor of data analytics and economics** at School of Business at SUNY Geneseo.

My research interests lie in **economics of the environment and climate change**.

<!-- My teaching interests are in **economics and data science**. My students use the tools of machine learning, econometrics, and data visualization to address **business strategies**, **public policy**, and **individual decision-making**. -->

## Research

### Working papers

1️⃣ Social Media Campaign, Lobbying, and Legislation: Evidence from #cliamtechange and Energy Lobbies\
2️⃣ Climate Finance under Conflicts and Renegotiations: A Dynamic Contract Approach


### Work in progress

🌟 '*Hiding Behind a Small Cake*' in an Online Dictator Game: The Way You Hide Matters!, (with Tabaré Capitan (1st author) , Jason Shogren, and Benjamin White).



### Book chapters

🌟 Governance and Climate Finance in the Developing World (with Tilsa Oré-Monago).\
  -&nbsp;In Wu, F., Zhang, D., and Ji, Q. (Eds.), *Climate Finance: Supporting a Sustainable Energy Transition*, Chapter 7, Springer Nature (Forthcoming, 2024).
